alert.note: Alert for Hayes (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 26 at 8:37PM CDT until May 27 at 3:35PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Nebraska... Stinking Water Creek at Palisade 2NW affecting Hayes County. .Water levels remain elevated along the Stinking Water Creek near Palisade due to earlier heavy rainfall. The creek level is expected to continue to fall tonight. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring, though creek levels should continue to fall tonight. * WHERE...Stinking Water Creek at Palisade 2NW. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Flood Stage. Agricultural land along the creek floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Friday the stage was 9.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 2.7 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
